title: So you're getting a divorce
creator_credit: Stephen Wallace, Suzanne Baker and Film Australia
brief_description: This dramatised documentary made in conjunction with the Family Court of Australia aims at assisting people considering a divorce. Showing the main functions of the Family Court, the video provides you with an understanding of these processes. It clearly explains issues such as Simple Dissolution, Conciliation Conference, Finmancial Settlements, Property, Custody and the implications of Contested Litigation.
